features.name: Dynamic Page Builder
features.description: Block-based page builder system that dynamically renders pages from Directus CMS with composable blocks (hero, richtext, gallery, pricing, posts, forms)

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with login, register, password reset, JWT token management, and protected routes with role-based access control

features.name: Event Management System
features.description: Complete event management platform with event creation, editing, ticket sales, attendee tracking, and event configuration for event organizers

features.name: Stripe Payment Integration
features.description: Complete Stripe integration for ticket purchases with checkout sessions, payment processing, and organizer onboarding with Stripe Connect

features.name: Ticket Management
features.description: Ticket purchasing, viewing, and management system for users to buy and view their tickets for events

features.name: Organizer Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard and management interface for event organizers with stats, profile management, and event administration

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User and organizer profile management with profile editing, password changes, and account settings

features.name: Directus CMS Integration
features.description: Deep integration with Directus headless CMS including data fetching, type generation, rate limiting, and form handling

features.name: Dynamic Forms System
features.description: Dynamic form generation and validation system that creates forms based on Directus schema with Zod validation

features.name: Blog System
features.description: Blog functionality with post listings and individual post pages with SEO optimization

features.name: Visual Editing Integration
features.description: Directus Live Preview and visual editing integration for content editors to preview changes in real-time

features.name: Navigation System
features.description: Dynamic navigation with header, footer, and mobile-responsive navigation menus generated from Directus

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Site-wide search functionality for finding content across the application

features.name: Image Upload & Management
features.description: Image upload functionality with Directus files integration for managing event images and logos

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark/light theme support with theme persistence and toggle functionality

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive UI component library built with Radix UI primitives and Tailwind CSS for consistent design

features.name: SEO & Metadata
features.description: SEO optimization with dynamic sitemap generation and metadata management

features.name: Redirects Management
features.description: Dynamic redirect management system for handling URL redirects configured in Directus

features.name: Middleware & Route Protection
features.description: Next.js middleware for authentication, authorization, and route protection with role-based access

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: Toast notification system for user feedback and error messages
